valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 5 Oct 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 6 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low north of Fair Isle 955 expected Kattegat 990 by 1800 Sunday. High west of FitzRoy 1031 expected FitzRoy 1028 by same time
